headlineAndCaption.headline: Post your most favourite places
headlineAndCaption.caption: you can upload photos of your favourite places with adding a comment and geo-data

firstStep.label: Select your photo
firstStep.description: Select photos of your favourite places from Flickr. You can select up to 5 photos per post

secondStep.label: Input Title and Explanation
secondStep.description: Attract viewer's attentions! Input the title of this post and some explanation of the speciality for this place, so that viewers will set the next destination to this place.

thirdStep.label: Where is this place?
thirdStep.description: Specify the country of this place, as well as putting a PIN on the map

finalStep.label: Complete the upload!
finalStep.description: Is everything ok with all the input data?
